title: Enable GSC for CLCP and SE keyword tracking
description: GSC service account has siteFullUser access to all 3 properties: ISK, CLCP, SE.

title: Wire Mission Control to live data
description: Activity feed, calendar, memory pages need to pull from real data sources instead of the nightly JSON push. Future state: live API calls vs nightly mc-data.json sync.

title: Build content strategy for ISK landing pages
Define Cara's first real task
description: Cara built out with full SOP — Stripe lookup, Supabase activity, reply templates, no-refund policy, dunning scenario. All 3 products covered.

title: Enable Search Console API in Google Cloud Console
description: GSC API is live — Miles has been running ISK reports. Service account confirmed working with all 3 properties.

title: Set up competitor keyword tracking
description: Track competitor keyword positions for all products.

title: Set up weekly UGC performance tracking
description: Mia needs a recurring task to track UGC creator performance weekly.

title: Set up Convex for MC database
description: Superseded. MC is already running on Supabase (mc_realtime table, live updates via mc-sync.sh). Convex was never implemented.

title: CLCP organic SEO — stop the decline
description: CLCP organic traffic is declining and Miles has spent zero time on it (ISK-only focus). Need GSC access + keyword audit + at least one actionable recommendation. This is real revenue being left on the table.

title: Make Automations page schedule timeline dynamic
description: Daily Schedule timeline and Weekly Grid are hardcoded arrays in automations/page.tsx (DAILY_JOBS, WEEKLY_JOBS). New crons don't appear there without manual code edits. Should derive schedule from live cron data (d.calendar + d.bashCrons) so any new automation shows up automatically.
